entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Whitehorse
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whitehorse Airport 11:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -13.8°C
Wind: N 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
